headline.main: U.S. PLANES REARM NEAR EAST FORCES; American Air Corps Chief Describes British Pilots as 'Tremendously Pleased'

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 16 (AP) -- Major Gen. George H. Brett, chief of the United States Army Air Corps, said today the Near East war front was being "completely refurnished with American aircraft as rapidly as possible." He described British pilots as "tremendously pleased."
abstract: Brett says U S planes rearm Brit Near East forces

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
